author: Los Angeles Times Staff
title: Oscars: How much do you know about Academy Awards history? Take our quiz - LA Times
text:
Oscars: How much do you know about Academy Awards history? Take our quiz Lupita Nyong'o Al Seib / Los Angeles Times Lupita Nyong'o won the supporting actress Oscar at the 86th Academy Awards, but what year was the category created? Lupita Nyong'o won the supporting actress Oscar at the 86th Academy Awards, but what year was the category created? (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times) By Los Angeles Times Staff 
The 88th Academy Awards will be given out Sunday, February 27th. Fans of the awards season know "Spotlight," "The Revenant" and "The Big Short," but how well do you know the 87 previous Academy Award shows? 
If you're feeling a little shaky, have a look at our Oscars timeline for a quick refresher and then take the quiz below. If you need to brush up on this year's awards, make sure to check out our full Oscars 2016 coverage where you can find the complete list nominees then use our play-at-home ballot to make your predictions known.
